name: System Health Check
prompt: Quick system health check. Run `botcore check_system_health`. If ALL services are healthy, respond with exactly 'ALL_HEALTHY' and nothing else - do NOT send any notification. ONLY if something is wrong: send an URGENT alert to Telegram using `botcore send_telegram_notification '{{"message":"\u26a0\ufe0f HEALTH ALERT: <which service is unhealthy, error details, suggested fix>"}}'`. Be specific and urgent in alerts.
